DOC.brief_summary: Collect evaluate long term safety data .
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Follow-up 23mm Portico™ Aortic Valve Implant St. Jude Medical Transfemoral Delivery System
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study collect evaluate long term safety data 23mm Portico™ Transcatheter Heart Valve transfemoral Delivery System previously implant subject aortic valve disease .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject give write study Informed Consent participation prior study procedure . 2 . Subject ≥ 18 year age legal age host country time consent . 3 . Subject currently 23mm SJM Portico Transfemoral Transcatheter Heart Valve 1 . Subject currently participate another investigational device drug study . 2 . Subject unable unwilling return require followup visit .
